item.trans: n. 管家；乘务员；膳务员；工会管事 vi. 当服务员；当管事 vt. 管理 同义词:chamberlain, seneschal, manage, conduct, run, direct, control to steward a house作家庭主管
n. 问题；流出；期号；发行物 vt. 发行，发布；发给；放出，排出 vi. 发行；流出；造成…结果；传下 同义词:question, flux, discharge, exhaust, discharge, shed They issued out into the street.他们涌到街上。
adv. 主要地，基本上 同义词:mainly, mostly, largely, primarily, ultimately " Basically I think it is very good news for us , " he said.他表示：“基本上我认为，这对于我们来说是个很好的消息。”
vt. 蒸，散发；用蒸汽处理 n. 蒸汽；精力 vi. 蒸，冒水汽 adj. 蒸汽的 同义词:shed, energy, vigor, vapor the boiler that is steaming正在喷着蒸汽的锅炉
vi. 发霉 vt. 浇铸；用泥土覆盖 n. 模具；霉 同义词:go moldy, cast, typecast, mildew These huge presses mould the car bodies.这些巨大的压床模压出汽车车身。

n. 沼泽；湿地 vt. 使陷于沼泽；使沉没；使陷入困境 vi. 下沉；陷入沼泽；陷入困境；不知所措（过去式swamped，过去分词swamped，现在分词swamping，第三人称单数swamps，名词swampiness，形容词swampy） 同义词:wetland, cienaga, embog, sunk His words were swamped by the laughter.他的话淹没在笑声之中。
n. 桶，水桶；铲斗；一桶的量 v. 倾盆而下；颠簸着行进 同义词:barrel, pail, pour down to bucket water from a river用桶从河里打水
n. 化学制品，化学药品 adj. 化学的 同义词:chymic It requires chemical signals from sorghum seeds to grow .它的生长需要高粱种子的化学信号。
n. 相互作用；[数] 交互作用 同义词:reciprocity, mutual effect Scientists call the interaction of light with phonons the Raman effect .科学家将光与声子的交互作用称为拉曼效应。
n. 图书馆员；图书管理员 同义词:library technician Yes , I asked librarian to help me .找到了，我请图书管理员帮忙了。
vt. 发音；宣判；断言 vi. 发音；作出判断 同义词:declare, pass sentence, articulate The priest said, “I now pronounce you man and wife.”神父说：“我现在宣布你们两人结为夫妻。”

n. [作物] 芦苇；簧片；牧笛；不可依靠的人 vt. 用芦苇盖；用芦苇装饰 同义词:Phragmites, phragmites communis One day , as punishment for a bit of childish willfulness , she puts Jane into the room in which Mr. Reed died .一天，作为对简一丁点儿孩子气任性的惩罚，里德太太把她关进了里德先生病故的那个房间。
n. 狂热；放任 vt. 遗弃；放弃 同义词:loose, mania, desert, yield, quit He abandoned all hope.他放弃一切希望。
vt. 战胜，征服；攻克，攻取 vi. 胜利；得胜 同义词:defeat, master, overcome, win the day They conquered the southern part of the country in a few months.他们在几个月的时间里攻占了该国的南部。
n. 必然；确实；确实的事情 同义词:very like a whale, inerrability The only certainty is that even though GM has a new boss , the government is really in control .而唯一能肯定的就是，即使通用换了新掌门人，实际上还是在政府操控之下。

adv. 特别地，非常；另外 n. 临时演员；号外；额外的事物；上等产品 adj. 额外的，另外收费的；特大的 同义词:specifically, particularly, badly, highly, greatly, too, walker-on, special edition, additional, added, excess We have a teacher at my school who gives us extra lessons sometimes .我们学校里有名老师有时给我们上一些额外的课程。
vt. 唤醒；激起，使振奋；惊起 vi. 醒来；奋起 n. 觉醒；奋起 同义词:arouse, wake sb. up, wake up, waken up, arousal, wakefulness It's time to rouse them.该叫醒他们了。
vt. 减轻，缓和；使安心 n. 轻松，舒适；安逸，悠闲 vi. 减轻，缓和；放松；灵活地移动 同义词:moderate, relax, comfort, leisure, relax, to alleviate to ease the pain of a wound减轻伤口的疼痛
adj. 甜的；悦耳的；芳香的；亲切的 n. 糖果；乐趣；芳香；宝贝 （俚）酷毙了 同义词:harmonious, friendly, musical, fragrant, benign, fun, joy, aroma, honey, enjoyment Love is a sweet torment .爱是一种甜蜜的折磨。
n. 健康；卫生；保健；兴旺 同义词:fitness, hygiene, wellness What do you think of health in your country ?你认为你所在国家的健康情况如何？
adj. 普遍的，广泛的；分布广的 同义词:extensive, universal, comprehensive, ruling, generalized Its memory is the embryonic form of the widespread now virtual memory .它的存储器是现在广为采用的虚拟存储器的雏形。

n. [计] 程序；日常工作；例行公事 adj. 日常的；例行的 同义词:procedure, program, daily, everyday, household Our Insurance Manager handles most of it , and his secretary looks after the routine and clerical work .大部分由保险经理处理，日常事务和文书工作由他的秘书去做。
vt. 感觉；认为；触摸；试探 vi. 觉得；摸索 n. 感觉；触摸 同义词:expect, count, guess, find, make, fish for, poke about, consciousness, sense perception Can you tell what this is by feeling it?你能摸出这是什么东西吗?
n. 天鹅绒，丝绒；天鹅绒似的东西 adj. 天鹅绒的 同义词:continental quilt, velour It feels like velvet to me .我摸起来像天鹅绒。
n. 挑战；怀疑 vt. 向…挑战 同义词:dare, doubt I challenged him to a game of chess.我向他挑战，要跟他下一盘棋。
adj. 潮湿的；多雨的；含泪的 n. 潮湿 同义词:wet, humid, dampness, humidification It was moisting when we were in the street.我们在街上时正下着毛毛雨。
n. 目标；物体；客体；宾语 vt. 提出…作为反对的理由 vi. 反对；拒绝 同义词:target, goal, end, cause, aim, refuse, sit down on I will not wear this dress if you object to it.如果你不喜欢这件衣服，那我就不再穿它了。
adj. [数] 负的；消极的；否定的；阴性的 n. 否定；负数；[摄] 底片 vt. 否定；拒绝 同义词:passive, destructive, infirmation, disaffirmation, deny, refuse He negatived it was true.他否认这件事是真的。

n. 幻想；想像力；爱好 adj. 想象的；奇特的；昂贵的；精选的 vt. 想象；喜爱；设想；自负 vi. 幻想；想象 同义词:interest, like, fantasy, expensive, rich, ideal, picked, dear, enjoy, vision, image, have vision of, to imagine Can you fancy him in uniform?你能想像一下他穿制服的样子吗?
n. 改革，改良；改正 vt. 改革，革新；重新组成 vi. 重组；改过 adj. 改革的；改革教会的 同义词:transformation, correction, amendment, renovate, reconstitute, shake up, realign He has reformed his bad habits.他已改变了他的坏习惯。
adj. 可笑的；荒谬的 同义词:laughing, preposterous Simply to imagine a pig flying is ridiculous .光是想象一只猪在飞就觉得荒谬可笑。
adj. 狡猾的；淘气的；诡密的 同义词:designing, knowing, subtle, tricky To cooperate or curry favor with in a sly or devious way .搞秘密交易以一种秘密的或不正当的途径合作或搞交易。
n. （美）玉米；（英）谷物；[皮肤] 鸡眼 vt. 腌；使成颗粒 同义词:grain, zea mays, preserve to corn beef腌牛肉

n. 发现，发觉；被发现的事物 同义词:detection, occurrence, find Still , the discovery is seen as good news for people who have severe dry skin or other conditions that cause itching .对于那些患有由严重皮肤干燥或其它原因引起的瘙痒病人，这一发现仍然是一个好消息。
n. 区别；差别；特性；荣誉、勋章 同义词:quality, identity, character, tang, discrimination The first is the thermodynamic distinction between past and future .第一个是过去与未来在热力学上的区别。
n. 奶油，乳脂；精华；面霜；乳酪 同义词:essence, elite, flower, prime, distillation Don't stir the milk until it creams.不要搅动牛奶，直到上面结皮。
vt. 追逐；追捕；试图赢得；雕镂 vi. 追逐；追赶；奔跑 n. 追逐；追赶；追击 同义词:go after, track down, pursue, go after, pursuit, hunting The children are chasing one another among the bushes.孩子们在树丛中互相追逐。
n. 伏特（电压单位）；环骑；闪避 同义词:jook Chevy Volt , a car that can go up to 40 miles before it uses any gas at all. That 's an American revolution .雪佛兰伏特，能不耗费一滴油跑完40英里。这就是美国式的革命。
adj. 残酷的，残忍的；使人痛苦的 同义词:iron, brutal Without love a person could go hayward and also become cruel and ferocious .没有爱的人生可能会误入禁区，也会变得残酷而凶恶。
n. 属，种；种族，人种；家庭，门弟 vt. 使参加比赛；和…竞赛；使急走，使全速行进 vi. 比速度，参加竞赛；全速行进 同义词:family, house, genus They are racing to see who is fastest.他们在赛跑，看谁跑得最快。
n. 平锅，盘子；摇镜头 vi. （镜头）被摇动 vt. 淘金；摇镜头 同义词:holloware prospector panning for gold淘金的人
n. 建设；建筑物；解释；造句 同义词:interpretation, explanation, fabric, building, structure But most of the casinos are still under construction .然而大多数赌场的建设仍在进行中。
n. 最小值；最低限度；最小化；最小量 adj. 最小的；最低的 同义词:lowest, least, smallest No , not if you maintain a minimum balance of 500 dollars .如果你保持最少500美元的话就不收手续费。
adj. 历史的；史学的；基于史实的 With the fall of the Roman empire , historical evidence becomes scarce .随着罗马帝国的沦落，历史性的证据变得稀少。
adv. 确实地，无庸置疑地 同义词:strictly, real These breakthroughs will undoubtedly lead to further advancements in the near future .毫无疑问，这些突破将导致未来的进一步发展。
vt. 维持；继续；维修；主张；供养 同义词:pursue, submit, sustain, advocate, service He maintained his rights.他维护了自己的权利。
n. 研究员 同义词:boffin This is a subject into which many scientists have researched with no result.这是一个虽经很多科学家研究过但尚无结果的课题。
n. 建筑学；建筑风格；建筑式样 同义词:architectural style Traditionally , a workstation 's throughput depends on its bus and memory architecture , as well as its CPU speed .传统上讲，工作站的吞吐量与其总线和存储器体系结构以及CPU的速度有关。
vt. 察觉，感觉；理解；认知 vi. 感到，感知；认识到 同义词:detect, feel, absorb, see, read, to feel, come to realize The students perceived that his behavior had changed.同学们发觉他的行为有些变化。
n. 项链 I want to buy necklace .我想买一条项链。
adj. 欧洲的；欧洲人的 n. 欧洲人 IT WAS formally one election to a single body , the European Parliament .形式上讲，这只是欧洲议会这一个部门的一次选举。
n. 稳定性；坚定，恒心 同义词:firmness, adament Is this to be the vaunted " stability "?这就是被大肆吹嘘的“稳定”吗？
adj. 外面的，外部的；外来的 n. 外部；外观 adv. 在外面，向外面；在室外 prep. 在…范围之外 同义词:outer, external, out, without, surface, face, garment, without, ectad, beyond the pale to run outside the house跑向屋外
n. 抽屉；[会计] 开票人 The water reservoir was in a concealed drawer at the bottom.储水槽在机器底部一个隐蔽的抽屉里。
n. [畜牧][脊椎] 骆驼；打捞浮筒；工作作风官僚 adj. 驼色的；暗棕色的 vi. 工作刻板平庸 同义词:oont And farmers can use camel west waste to fertilize their crops .农民能用骆驼的粪便来给农作物施肥。
n. 女房东；女地主；女店主 同义词:hostess landlady complains of his staying up late at night .女房东对他的熬夜表示不满。
n. 兴旺；茂盛；挥舞；炫耀；华饰 vt. 夸耀；挥舞 vi. 繁荣，兴旺；茂盛；活跃；处于旺盛时期 同义词:health, display, air, sport, succeed, flower, thrive Those plants you gave me are flourishing.你给我的那些植物长得茂盛。
n. 段落；短评；段落符号 vt. 将…分段 The teacher taught the students how to paragraph an essay.老师教学生如何把一篇文章分段。
n. 大衣，外套 同义词:outerwear, outer coat He stepped back a few paces and unbuttoned his overcoat .他后退了几步，解开了他的大衣。
vt. 加强，加固；强化；补充 vi. 求援；得到增援；给予更多的支持 n. 加强；加固物；加固材料 同义词:enhance, cement, muscle, supply, build up, strengthening, armoure The regular troops need to be reinforced.正规部队将需要增援。
n. 邮件；邮政，邮递；盔甲 vt. 邮寄；给…穿盔甲 vi. 邮寄；寄出 同义词:armour, dawk, send off, pack off She mailed the package to me.她把包裹寄给我。
adv. 逐步地；渐渐地 同义词:stage by stage, step by step Gradually a smile appeared on her face .慢慢地她脸上露出一丝笑容。
n. 故事；传说；叙述；流言蜚语 同义词:relation, story, tradition, statement, narrative It sounds like something from a fairy tale .这听来像是源自一个仙女传说。
vi. 依赖，依靠；取决于；相信，信赖 同义词:hope, tie to You may depend on the accuracy of the report.你可以信赖报告的准确性。
n. 局，处；衣柜；办公桌 同义词:department, innings Perhaps ask to bureau directly .或者直接到教育局问啊。
adj. 下雪的，多雪的；被雪覆盖的；洁白无瑕的 同义词:nival Among the ranges of snowy peaks you suddenly come upon a marvellous, vast pastureland .就在雪的群峰的围绕中，一片奇丽的千里牧场展现在你的眼前。

vt. 记录，记载；标明；将...录音 vi. 记录；录音 n. 档案，履历；唱片；最高纪录 adj. 创纪录的 同义词:register, keep track of, keep track of, make notes of, disk, file, resume, disc It is a book that records the fall of the Third Reich.它是一本记载第三帝国衰亡的书。
adj. 胆小的；羞怯的 同义词:modest, harehearted Tiny Saarland proposes timid one- year extension of primary school , but may fail to enact the needed constitutional change.小萨尔州建议试探性将小学教育延长一年，但是涉及到修宪的法案可能不获通过。
n. 地狱；究竟（作加强语气词）；训斥；黑暗势力 vi. 过放荡生活；飞驰 int. 该死；见鬼（表示惊奇、烦恼、厌恶、恼怒、失望等） 同义词:Sam Hill, sheol, rocket, ball it up, d*amn, Gadsbodikins He was helling around when in Europe.在欧洲期间，他一直过着花天酒地的生活。

n. 准备；预赛；初步措施 adj. 初步的；开始的；预备的 同义词:preparation, arrangement, provision, opening, rudimentary The preliminary results were revealing : the average atrophy was greater in those with lower back pain than was normal .初步结果可是发人深省：遭受下背疼痛之苦的人，大脑平均萎缩程度要比正常人还多。

n. 焦点；中心；清晰；焦距 vt. 使集中；使聚焦 vi. 集中；聚焦；调节焦距 同义词:center, hub, fairness, centralize, concentrate, band If you focus the sun's rays on dry wood with a burning-glass, it will start burning.如果你用取火镜使太阳光线聚焦在干木头上，木头就会燃烧起来。
adj. 社会的，社交的；群居的 n. 联谊会；联欢会 同义词:gregarious, sodality, get-together Their most important goal , they say , is to create social value .他们说，他们最重要的目标，是为了创造社会价值。
adj. 缺席的；缺少的；心不在焉的；茫然的 vt. 使缺席 同义词:missing, vacant to absent oneself from classes旷课，不去上课
vt. 类似，像 同义词:favor He resembles his father very much in character.他在性格上非常像他父亲。
adj. 顽皮的，淘气的；不听话的；没规矩的；不适当的；下流的 同义词:blue, dirty, unhappy, inadequate, wrong " You naughty children , " says their stepmother .“你们两个顽皮的孩子，”后母说。
adj. 动态的；动力的；动力学的；有活力的 n. 动态；动力 同义词:vital, actional, trends, momentum, impetus This reflects the dynamic growth of the physics discipline during this century .这反映出物理学这个学科在本世纪的茁壮成长。
vt. 使闪耀；使张开；用发光信号发出；使外倾 vi. 闪耀，闪光；燃烧；突然发怒 n. 闪光，闪耀；耀斑；爆发；照明弹 同义词:sparkle, burn, shine on, explosion, stroboflash The fire flared up as the paper caught.纸着火时突然烧了起来。
n. 入口；进入 vt. 使出神，使入迷 同义词:threshold, access, portal, way in to be hypnotically entranced使受催眠似地神志恍惚
adj. 有罪的；内疚的 同义词:sinful, culpable I judged from his manner , that he was guilty .从他的态度上看，我断定他是有罪的。
vt. 使固定；集中于；扎牢；强加于 vi. 扣紧；抓住；集中注意力 同义词:focus on, fix, pay attention, take hold to fasten a boat to a tree by a rope用绳索把船系在树上
n. 面颊，脸颊；臀部 vt. 无礼地向…讲话，对…大胆无礼 同义词:bottom, vizard How could a student cheek his teacher like this?一个学生怎么能对老师这样无礼地讲话?
n. 智慧，才智；明智；学识；至理名言 同义词:wit, scholarship Wisdom of the ancients always served civilisation well.古代人的智慧总是推动着文明发展。
adj. 不寻常的；与众不同的；不平常的 同义词:different, distinctive, apart That is very unusual in modern American history.这在美国的现代史上是很罕见的。
n. 指南针，罗盘；圆规 vt. 包围 同义词:calliper, divider, case, invest, circumvent, encircle, ring about Their ship was compassing the earth.他们的船正围绕着地球环行。
n. 动作；移动；手势；请求；意向 vi. 运动；打手势 vt. 运动；向…打手势 同义词:removal, intention, move, shift, asking, do sport, do morning exercise, do sport, do morning exercise She motioned to the waiter.她向侍者招手。
n. 恢复，复原；痊愈；重获 同义词:regression, restoration, rehabilitation, retrieval, renewal Much of the recovery reflects the laws of physics .复苏在很大程度上反映出物理学定律。
n. 电视，电视机；电视业 同义词:video, tube Maybe he could even contact the television studio .也许他甚至可以联系一下电视台。
vt. 察觉；发现；探测 同义词:explore, perceive She detected the odor of gas in the room.她闻到房里有煤气味。
n. 作者；作家；创始人 vt. 创作出版 同义词:writer, pen She authored a history of the Chinese Revolution.她写了一部中国革命史。
n. 祖母；女祖先 vt. 当…的祖母 vi. 当祖母 同义词:nin, grammy Is the old lady sitting beside him your grandmother ?坐在他身旁的老太太就是你的曾祖母吗？
adj. 种族的；人种的 同义词:ethnic, tribal Their success helped lead to the decision by President Harry Truman in 1948 to end racial separation in the military .他们的成功对1948年杜鲁门总统做出结束军队中种族分离的决定起了很大作用。
n. 蜘蛛；设圈套者；三脚架 同义词:araneid, tripod When spider bites an insect , it does not kill the insect immediately .当一只蜘蛛咬一只昆虫的时候，它不会立刻就杀死这只昆虫。

n. 流感 The flu virus can't spread among humans … yet .目前，禽流感病毒尚不能在人类间传播。
n. 连续；继位；继承权；轮栽 同义词:series, heritage, progression And do they get to oversee succession planning ?他们能够监督继承计划吗？

adj. 明显的；明白的 同义词:obvious, distinct, visible Even on his last day at the White House , when the thinning hair and gaunt face of a cancer patient was so evident , he stressed how he loved his job .即使在他在白宫的最后一天，在一个癌症病人的稀疏的头发和憔悴的脸如此明显的情况下，他仍表达了他是多么的热爱他的工作。
n. 栽植；殖民；大农场 adj. 适用于种植园或热带、亚热带国家的 同义词:settlement, colonization A survey in 2007 found a third of plantation employees live in poverty .2007年的一项调查发现，三分之一种植业园工人生活在贫困之中。
adv. 有时，间或 同义词:occasionally, betweentimes Sometimes I know not if it be the wind .有时，我根本辨别不出它究竟是风声。
n. 奔流；倾注；迸发；连续不断 同义词:transfusion, decantation Not everyone agrees about the cause of this torrent of foreign capital .并非每个人都同意这股外资洪流的成因。
n. 标语；呐喊声 同义词:banner, catchline He has campaigned under the slogan " independence and solidarity ".福田康夫的竞选口号是“独立和团结”。
n. 居民；居住者 同义词:liver, resident, dweller, habitant The inhabitant is predispose to rheumatism by the damp climate .因气候潮湿，居民易患风湿症。

n. 船尾；末端 adj. 严厉的；坚定的 同义词:terminal, bottom, extreme, severe, committed, firm, confirmed, tight Alas , experience is a " lantern on stern , which shines only on the waves behind us ".唉，经验就是“一盏船尾的灯，它只在我们身后的波涛上放光”。
n. 大西洋 adj. 大西洋的 Ireland borders Atlantic Ocean .爱尔兰与大西洋毗邻。

adj. 向前的；早的；迅速的 adv. 向前地；向将来 vt. 促进；转寄；运送 n. 前锋 同义词:earlier, rapid, fast, ahead, ready, on, antrorsely, facilitate, promote, boost, freight, ship, stricker, vanguard He forwarded his friend's plan.他曾协助他朋友的计划。
adv. 正常地；通常地，一般地 同义词:commonly, currently, generally These precursor cells normally go on to produce red cells , white cells or platelets .这些前体细胞正常情况下可生成红细胞、白细胞或血小板。
n. 黄瓜；胡瓜 同义词:Chinese wampee, cuke And tomato and cucumber salad .西红柿和黄瓜沙位。
n. 识别；承认，认出；重视；赞誉；公认 同义词:identification, discernment Recognition of the interesting targets is the key technology of precise guide weapon system .典型目标的检测识别是精确制导武器的关键技术之一。
adj. 浪漫的；多情的；空想的 n. 浪漫的人 vt. 使…浪漫化 同义词:fantastic, amorous Gray and Burns were precursors of the Romantic movement in English Literature .格雷和伯恩斯是英国文学浪漫主义运动的先驱。
n. 二月 February is the shortest month of the year .二月是一年之中最短的一个月。
n. 救济；减轻，解除；安慰 同义词:comfort, almsgiving Time , the best physician of the mind , at length brought me relief .时间，这位最擅于医治心灵的大夫，终于安慰了我。
vt. 分类；分等 同义词:categorize, sort through He says the administration decision to re- classify those documents is symptomatic of a larger , growing problem .他说将档案重新分类处理的行政决定是问题更严重，不断扩大的一种前兆。
n. 尺；统治者；[测] 划线板，划线的人 同义词:governor, dominator Do you have a long ruler ?你有一个长点的尺子吗？
vt. 嫁；娶；与……结婚 vi. 结婚 同义词:go to the world, be married to, get married, tie the knot, get hitched, change one's condition, make a match He married a beautiful girl.他娶了一个漂亮的姑娘。
vt. 把……装入桶内 n. 桶；枪管，炮管 vi. 快速移动 同义词:bucket, pail, skirr They planned to barrel the beer next Monday.他们打算下星期一把啤酒装桶。
adj. 同情的；交感神经的；共鸣的；赞同的；和谐的；合意的 n. 交感神经；容易感受的人 同义词:harmonious, balanced, acceptable, vagus nerve Those supposed supporters swore that they would be sympathetic to our plan .那些所谓的支持者发誓说他们会赞成这个计划。
n. 十二月 This is me at school in December .这就是十二月在学校中的我。
n. 宇宙；世界；领域 同义词:world, domain, province, territory, kingdom Hydrogen atoms are the smallest and lightest in the universe .氢原子是宇宙当中最小和最轻的原子。
vt. 创造，创作；造成 同义词:produce, invent Shakespeare created many comic characters.莎士比亚创作了很多喜剧人物。
vt. 提供；出价；试图 n. 提议；出价；意图；录取通知书 vi. 提议；出现；献祭；求婚 同义词:afford, undertake, try, tender, lend, proposal, intention, meaning, will, bid, occur, figure, come out He offered me a glass of wine.他给了我一杯葡萄酒。
n. 旅游，旅行；巡回演出 vt. 旅行，在……旅游；在……作巡回演出 vi. 旅行，旅游；作巡回演出 同义词:journey, trip, travel, have a trip, go on a trip, travel, have a trip She plans to tour about the world.她打算周游世界。
adj. 不顾一切的；令人绝望的；极度渴望的 同义词:venturous, devil-may-care Outsiders may do more to help — at least to tackle the desperate plight of civilians .局外人也许能给予更多的帮助——至少可以缓解平民的绝望困境。
n. 破坏；失事；残骸；失去健康的人 vt. 破坏；使失事；拆毁 vi. 失事；营救失事船只 同义词:destruction, breaking, blasting, remain, disruption, destroy, undermine, founder My car was completely wrecked in the accident.我的车在这次车祸中彻底毁了。
n. 圣经 to bible a church为教堂提供《圣经》
n. 标志；马克；符号；痕迹 vi. 作记号 vt. 标志；做标记于；打分数 同义词:symbol, sign, seal, flag, trace, signal The hot cups have marked the table badly.这些热杯子把桌面都烫坏了。

adj. 呆板的；坚硬的；严厉的；拘谨的；拘谨的 adv. 僵硬地；彻底地 n. 死尸；令人讨厌者；流通票据；劳动者 vt. 亏待侍者等 vi. 在商业上惨败 同义词:mechanical, severe, wooden, rigid, dead, thoroughly, entirely, completely, fully, tight, worker, dead body He was often stiffed.他常常拿不到小费。

adj. 正派的；得体的；相当好的 同义词:proper, goodish The best argument is that , having committed to building a decent state in Afghanistan , the west has a moral obligation to keep going.最有说服力的论据是，既然承诺在阿富汗建立一个像样的国家，西方就背负着信守承诺的道德义务。

adj. 奇怪的；同性恋的；不舒服的；心智不平衡的 vt. 搞糟；使陷于不利地位 n. 同性恋者；怪人；伪造的货币 同义词:strange, uncomfortable, make a mess of, foul up, put, gay His cheating on the final examination queered his chances of graduation.他在期终考试中作弊使他失掉了毕业的机会。
n. 松鼠；松鼠毛皮 vt. 贮藏 同义词:store, reposit to squirrel away some money for the future存些钱以备不时之需
adj. 优雅的；优美的 同义词:elegant, pretty, exquisite Then she saw a graceful swan .然后她看到一只优雅的天鹅。
n. 监护人；饲养员；看守人；管理人 同义词:supervisor, guardian, administrator An old poacher makes the best keeper .惯偷可做最佳看守人（以盗制盗）。
n. 屏，幕；屏风 vt. 筛；拍摄；放映；掩蔽 vi. 拍电影 同义词:curtain, creen, project, ree, shoot, make a film to screen off the corner of the stage with the setting用布景隔开舞台的一角
n. 名声，名誉；声望 同义词:credit, name, fame, celebrity, prestige Typical of the Scotch , Burns had a reputation for being funny and charming .彭斯是一名典型的苏格兰人，以有趣和有魅力而闻名。

adj. 突出的，显著的；杰出的；卓越的 同义词:obvious, excellent, remarkable, brilliant, marked A few weeks ago a prominent white rancher near the border was killed , possibly by a smuggler or illegal immigrant .几周前，一位著名的白人大农场主在边境附近被杀害，可能是走私者或非法移民所为。
n. [电] 电压 同义词:electric tension, electrical pressure The control of voltage and reactive power are inseparable .电压控制和无功功率的控制是分不开的。
vt. 监禁；关押；使…下狱 同义词:prison, jail China frequently uses the charge of subversion to imprison dissidents .中国经常贾用“颠覆政权”来逮捕持不同政见者。
n. 信用，信誉；[金融] 贷款；学分；信任；声望 vt. 相信，信任；把…归给，归功于；赞颂 同义词:faith, reputation, honor, loan, confidence, put faith in, believe in I didn't credit that absurd tale.我不相信那个荒谬绝伦的故事。
adj. 巨大的，广大的；无边无际的；非常好的 同义词:huge, tremendous, enormous, massive, macro She drew immense strength and wisdom from the masses .她从群众中吸取了巨大的力量和智慧。
n. 长袍，礼服；制服 vi. 穿长袍 vt. 使穿长袍 同义词:uniform, cope In the early morning,she robed and went out.一清早她穿上衣服就出去了。
n. 匙，勺子；一杓的量 vt. 用匙舀；使成匙状 vi. 轻轻向上击 同义词:scooper She spooned the milk to her baby.她用匙给她的婴孩喂奶。
n. 系列，连续；[电] 串联；级数；丛书 同义词:succession, progression For such a series it is usual to design a standard margin .对于这种系列图幅，通常是设计一种标准图廓。
adj. 快乐的；愉快的；高兴的 同义词:happy, pleased, glad, good, bright His life was hard , but Dick was always cheerful .迪克的生活虽然艰苦，但他始终很快乐。
adv. 非常；异乎寻常地；显著地 同义词:extremely, badly, highly, greatly, too She has an unusually life of philosophy .她有着不同寻常的人生观。
adv. 自然地 同义词:spontaneously, unaffectedly Naturally , the reds see it differently .“红衫军”的看法自然不同。
vt. 预报，预测；预示 n. 预测，预报；预想 vi. 进行预报，作预测 同义词:predict, indicate, calculate, shadow, prediction, divination Such events may forecast an outbreak of war.这些事件可能预示着战争的爆发。
n. 草地；草坪 同义词:grass, meadow The lawn is the archetypal enemy .草坪就是个典型的敌人。
n. 习惯；风俗；海关 adj. 定制的，定做的 同义词:manner, habit, way, made-to-order, tailored Local Muslim custom requires that the dead are buried within 24 hours .当地的穆斯林习俗要求死者在24小时内下葬。
n. 树荫；阴影；阴凉处；遮阳物；（照片等的）明暗度；少量、些微；细微的差别 vt. 使阴暗；使渐变；为…遮阳；使阴郁；掩盖 vi. （颜色、色彩等）渐变 同义词:umbrage, fantom, dull, overshadow, graduate to shade one's eyes with his hand用手遮住眼睛
vt. 使惊吓；吓唬… vi. 害怕，惊恐 同义词:be nervous of, be fearful of The noise frightened the child.喧哗声使小孩惊恐万分。
vt. 滴；使降低；使终止；随口漏出 vi. 下降；终止 n. 滴；落下；空投；微量；滴剂 同义词:kill, closure, decline, determine, finish, pass, go down, suggestion, falling, trace Rain drops from the clouds.云能生雨。
n. 公主；王妃；女巨头 同义词:infanta, rani princess watches her ball .公主看着她的球。
vt. 演说；从事；忙于；写姓名地址；向…致辞 n. 地址；演讲；致辞；说话的技巧 同义词:undertake, pursue, have, speech, lecture, talk to address an assembly向与会者发表讲话

n. 评论；意见；批评 vi. 发表评论；发表意见 vt. 为…作评语 同义词:opinion, criticism, mind, judgement, thinking, declare oneself, air one's opinion Would you care to comment on why you voted against the new housing project?对您投票反对新住宅规划的原因您愿意解释一下吗?
n. 丛林，密林；危险地带 adj. 丛林的；蛮荒的 同义词:mott, chaparral, backwoods This jungle must be cleared .这片丛林必须清理。

n. 干；茎；船首；血统 vt. 阻止；除去…的茎；给…装柄 vi. 阻止；起源于某事物；逆行 同义词:birth, blood, stock, block, dispute, prohibit, discourage, prevent from, head off The strawberries should be stemmed before they are tinned.装听之前，这些草莓得去掉果梗。
adv. 永远；曾经；究竟 同义词:forever, always, once How would he ever know ?他怎么样才能知道呢？

n. 天才，天赋；精神 同义词:energy, gift, spirit, soul, mind Genius is nothing but labor and diligence .天才只不过是劳动加勤奋。
vi. 盛行，流行；战胜，获胜 同义词:obtain, win Justice has prevailed,the guilty man has been punished.正义已经获胜，有罪的人受到了惩罚。
vt. 破坏；消灭；毁坏 同义词:undermine, founder Fire destroyed several houses in the area.大火烧毁了该地区的几栋房子。
vt. 减少；降低；使处于；把…分解 vi. 减少；缩小；归纳为 同义词:shorten, weaken, to cut down, fall off They have to reduce expenses this year.他们今年必须削减开支。
n. 作文，作曲；[材] 构成；合成物 同义词:synthetic, songwriting He crossed off the needless words in his composition .他从作文中把不必要的字都删掉了。
adv. 部分地；在一定程度上 同义词:half Refraction makes a straight stick look bent if it is partly in water .折射使一根部分浸在水中的直棍子看起来是弯的。
n. 女仆；少女 vt. 侍候；做新娘的女傧相 vi. 当女仆 同义词:servant girl, jill, wait upon, attend on She maided for Mr.Killin.她当基林先生的女仆。
adv. 因此，于是；相应地；照著 同义词:therefore, hence, consequently, thus, then Please amend your copy of the contract accordingly .请将你的合同副本做相应地修正。
n. 音乐家 同义词:eisteddfod He is a natural musician .他是天生的音乐家。
n. 分配；任务；作业；功课 同义词:allocation, distribution, role, mission, task Talking about your next job assignment is a good example of this .谈论你的下一个工作安排就是一个很好的例子。
n. 亚麻布，亚麻线；亚麻制品 adj. 亚麻的；亚麻布制的 同义词:flax, flaxen I quite like the linen . How much is one piece ?我很喜欢亚麻的。多少钱一块儿？
n. 小屋；客舱；船舱 vt. 把…关在小屋里 vi. 住在小屋里 同义词:shed, cottage The pioneers lived in a cabin in the woods .拓荒者住在森林里的一间小屋内。
vt. 刺激；使有动机；激发…的积极性 同义词:stimulate, fan, needle, activate Kindness motivated the action.仁慈是这一行动的动机。
vt. 查阅；商量；向…请教 vi. 请教；商议；当顾问 同义词:look up, speak together, take advice, seek advice I have to consult the manager about the matter.关于这件事我得向经理请示一下。
n. 影像；想象；肖像；偶像 vt. 想象；反映；象征；作…的像 同义词:icon, portrait, indicate, vision, glass, figure a warrior imaged in bronze用青铜铸成的武士
vi. 爬行；匍匐行进 vt. 爬行；缓慢地行进 n. 爬行；养鱼池；匍匐而行 同义词:creep, creep, aquarium A child learns to crawl before he learns to walk.小孩在学走路之前先学爬。
n. 投入；跳进 vi. 投入；陷入；跳进 vt. 使陷入；使投入；使插入 同义词:investment, input, plough into, throw one's self into, let sb in for, let in for to plunge an oar into the water使桨划入水中
n. 战役；斗争 vi. 斗争；作战 vt. 与…作战 同义词:war, conflict, campaign, campaign, fight, war They battled strong winds and heavy rains in their carriage.他们驾着马车与狂风暴雨搏斗。
vt. 使悲伤，使苦恼 vi. 悲痛，哀悼 同义词:harry, excruciate, mourn over, lament over She is grieved for you.她为你而悲伤。
n. 岳父；公公；继父 同义词:step-father He met his future father-in - law during his visit to Boston .他在波士顿小住期间遇见了他未来的岳父。

adj. 空的；中空的，空腹的；凹的；虚伪的 n. 洞；山谷；窟窿 vt. 使成为空洞 vi. 形成空洞 adv. 彻底地；无用地 同义词:empty, artificial, false, bare, vacant, hole, cavity, cavitate, thoroughly, entirely, completely, fully, tight He hollowed out a cave in the snowfield for night.他在雪原上挖了个洞以过夜。
n. [数] 极大，最大限度；最大量 adj. 最高的；最多的；最大极限的 同义词:ceiling amount, highest, supreme, peak, top, most The pursuit of maximum profit seems destined to prevail .追逐利润最大化似乎注定将会盛行。

n. 开始；机会；通路；空缺的职位 adj. 开始的 v. 开放（open的ing形式）；打开；公开 同义词:beginning, opportunity, threshold, conception, chance, preliminary, inauguratory, cracking, unwrapping His team defeated the defending champions from Argentina in their opening game .他的球队在揭幕比赛上打败了卫冕冠军阿根廷队。
n. 预备；准备 同义词:arrangement, preliminary, provision The report also calls for strengthening the math preparation of elementary and middle school teachers .报告也要求加强初级学校、初级中学教师在数学这课上的预修。
adv. 在头顶上；在空中；在高处 adj. 高架的；在头上的；在头顶上的 n. 天花板；[会计] 经常费用 同义词:aerially, ceiling boarding, current expenses Debits to Factory Overhead come from various sources .制造费用借方数据有几种来源。
n. 布丁 同义词:pud I never saw any one enjoy pudding so much , I think .我想，我从来没有看见过有人吃布丁吃得象他那样香甜的。
n. 暂停；间歇 vi. 暂停，停顿，中止；踌躇 同义词:hang, moratorium, stop, time out “Why did you pause?”“Go on.”“你为什么停顿下来了?”“继续下去。”
